titleStmt.title: VVits A.B.C. or A centurie of epigrams
titleStmt.author: West, Richard, fl. 1606-1619, attributed name.
Willet, Roland, b. 1588 or 9, attributed name.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by George Eld] for Thomas Thorp, and are to be sould [by L. Lisle] at the signe of the Tigers head in Paules Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Sometimes attributed to Richard West and to Roland Willet.
Printer's and bookseller's names and publication date from STC.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: the signe of the Tigers head in Paules Church-yard
